name: Web
bio1: Web Dev has 3 pathways to becoming a web developer
bio: Learn why web development is a thriving industry with 3 pathways to becoming a web developer, learn with live project, Debunking the biggest fears and misconceptions & build a freelance business.

name: AR VR
bio1: Computer Vision plays a fundamental role in AR/VR
bio: Computer Vision plays a fundamental role in AR/VR systems to see, analyze and understand the world.The aim of this workshop is to bring industry innovators and academic leaders in the AR/VR world to discuss the problems, applications and in general the state of the AR/VR systems.

name: Cloud
bio1: Conference on Cloud Tech 2021. Learn Infrastructure of the cloud
bio: Conference on Cloud Tech 2021. Learn Components and Infrastructure of the cloud, Assessing Security Risks, Tracking Cryptocurrency Exchange Trades with GCP in real time

name: Flutter
bio1: Let's build our first app together! Learn how declarative UI works
bio: Let's build our first app together! Learn how declarative UI works and when to use StatefulWidgets. Understand the fundamentals of dart packages. Deep dive into unit testing with Flutter.

name: ML
bio1: Learn Gradient Descent Algorithm, Data Processing
bio: Learn Gradient Descent Algorithm, Hyper parameters Grid Search, Data Processing, Classification Problems, Accuracy Prediction and Optimization & Roadmap to become a ML Engineer in 2021.

name: Startup
bio1: Startup Talk India’s Startup Podcast is ON AIR!
bio: Startup Talk India’s Startup Podcast is ON AIR! Sharing India’s startup stories. Celebrating the successes and failures in India’s startup ecosystem. We are talking to entrepreneurs, founders, innovators & leaders in India.
